item.title: Hugo Setup
item.description: This is not supposed to be an in-depth guide on all things Hugo. I rather intend to note down a few key essentials for me to come back to later. Adding new posts New posts can be added by running $ hugo new posts/postname.md in the root directory of the blog. The article will be automatically listed under posts on the page. If you plan on adding a separat page, that isnt supposed to be a post, you could add it under the page subdirectory.
